dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, Kazhydromet has released their, uh, three-day forecast for Astana and Almaty. Always interesting to see what's coming our way, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, Kazhydromet has released their, uh, three-day forecast for Astana and Almaty. Always interesting to see what's coming our way, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet meteorologists have shared the forecast for Astana and Almaty for the next three days " June 18 to 20.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. Especially with, like, how volatile the weather's been. So, let's dive into it. What's the word for Astana first, for June 18th to 20th?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. Especially with, like, how volatile the weather's been. So, let's dive into it. What's the word for Astana first, for June eighteenth to twentieth?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so for Astana, June 18th, uh, partly cloudy. Rain's expected during the day, possibly with thunderstorms and hail. And get this: nighttime temps 19 to 21 degrees, but daytime could hit 34 to 36! Hot and unstable.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so for Astana, June eighteenth, uh, partly cloudy. Rain's expected during the day, possibly with thunderstorms and hail. And get this: nighttime temps nineteen to twenty one degrees, but daytime could hit thirty four to thirty six! Hot and unstable.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 18: Partly cloudy skies. Rain is expected during the day, possibly accompanied by thunderstorms and hail. ... Nighttime temperatures will range from +19 to +21ÂC, with extreme daytime heat reaching +34 to +36ÂC. Hot and unstable conditions are expected.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, so like, thunderstorms *and* 36 degrees? That's quite a mix.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, so like, thunderstorms and thirty six degrees? That's quite a mix.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? And then, June 19th, still partly cloudy with occasional rain, thunderstorms, and possible hail again. Heat eases slightly to 26-28 degrees during the day, but winds pick up, 9-14 m/s, gusts up to 18!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? And then, June nineteenth, still partly cloudy with occasional rain, thunderstorms, and possible hail again. Heat eases slightly to twenty six to twenty eight degrees during the day, but winds pick up, nine to fourteen m/s, gusts up to eighteen!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 19: Partly cloudy with occasional rain and thunderstorms. Hail is again possible during the day. Southwesterly winds at 9"14 m/s, with gusts up to 15"18 m/s. Temperatures will be +20 to +22ÂC at night and will cool slightly during the day to +26 to +28ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so the heat's coming down a little, but, uh, the wind's gonna be a factor.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so the heat's coming down a little, but, uh, the wind's gonna be a factor.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And then for the 20th, still partly cloudy, more rain, thunderstorms, and hail. Temperatures drop further to 23-25 during the day. So, a continued drop in temperature with strong winds.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And then for the twentieth, still partly cloudy, more rain, thunderstorms, and hail. Temperatures drop further to twenty three to twenty five during the day. So, a continued drop in temperature with strong winds.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 20: Partly cloudy skies will continue, with occasional rain, thunderstorms, and possible hail. Southwesterly winds at 9"14 m/s, gusting up to 15"20 m/s in the daytime. Nighttime temperatures will drop to +18 to +20ÂC, with daytime highs of +23 to +25ÂC. A continued drop in temperature with strong winds is expected.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so Astana's cooling off. Now, what about Almaty? Is it getting a similar reprieve, or, like, what's happening there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so Astana's cooling off. Now, what about Almaty? Is it getting a similar reprieve, or, like, what's happening there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Uh, Almaty's a bit different. For the 18th, partly cloudy, no precipitation. But daytime highs are also hitting 34 to 36 degrees. They're saying that's the peak of the heat wave beginning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, Almaty's a bit different. For the eighteenth, partly cloudy, no precipitation. But daytime highs are also hitting thirty four to thirty six degrees. They're saying that's the peak of the heat wave beginning.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 18: Partly cloudy with no precipitation. Winds from the southwest, shifting to northwest, at 3"8 m/s. Nighttime temperatures between +21 and +23ÂC, and daytime highs reaching +34 to +36ÂC. The peak of the heat wave will begin.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oof, the peak. And for the 19th? Please tell me it gets better.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oof, the peak. And for the nineteenth? Please tell me it gets better.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, no, actually. The 19th, no rain expected, partly cloudy. But daytime temperatures are soaring to 37 to 39 degrees. They're calling it one of the hottest days of the summer so far.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, no, actually. The nineteenth, no rain expected, partly cloudy. But daytime temperatures are soaring to thirty seven to thirty nine degrees. They're calling it one of the hottest days of the summer so far.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 19: No rain expected. Partly cloudy skies with southeastern winds at 3"8 m/s. Temperatures will be +22 to +24ÂC at night and soar to +37 to +39ÂC during the day. It will be one of the hottest days of the summer so far.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Oh my goodness, 39 degrees? That's just brutal!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my goodness, thirty nine degrees? That's just brutal!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's pretty intense. But then, thankfully, the 20th for Almaty, partly cloudy with rain and thunderstorms during the day. And the heat will begin to subside, cooling to 29-31 degrees.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's pretty intense. But then, thankfully, the twentieth for Almaty, partly cloudy with rain and thunderstorms during the day. And the heat will begin to subside, cooling to twenty nine to thirty one degrees.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 20: Partly cloudy with rain and thunderstorms during the day. Northwest winds at 3"8 m/s. Nighttime temperatures will be +24 to +26ÂC, with daytime cooling to +29 to +31ÂC. The heat will begin to subside, though rainfall may affect daytime plans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so a bit of relief there, but still quite warm. So overall, quite a varied picture between the two cities for these three days.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so a bit of relief there, but still quite warm. So overall, quite a varied picture between the two cities for these three days.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. And the general forecast for June in Kazakhstan? What's the, uh, what's the vibe there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. And the general forecast for June in Kazakhstan? What's the, uh, what's the vibe there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the vibe is, like, 'expect everything.' Unstable conditions throughout the month, alternating between cool and hot spells, heavy rain, thunderstorms, hail, squally winds... And on some days, even dust storms are possible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the vibe is, like, 'expect everything.' Unstable conditions throughout the month, alternating between cool and hot spells, heavy rain, thunderstorms, hail, squally winds... And on some days, even dust storms are possible.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unstable conditions are expected throughout the month, alternating between cool and hot spells, accompanied by rain (sometimes heavy), thunderstorms, hail, and squally winds. On some days, dust storms are also possible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So basically, pack for every season if you're traveling anywhere in the country this month.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So basically, pack for every season if you're traveling anywhere in the country this month.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. A real, uh, meteorological roller coaster.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. A real, uh, meteorological roller coaster.
